title: saamy idhE
sahitya:
sAmi idE nalla samayam iSTa kAmiyam tara

anupallavi
 
bhUmi pugazhum shivakAmi tandarul kanda

caraNam
 
shruti jnAna nidhiyODu laya svara jnAnamum tulangavE marai tudi jnAnanidhi
nindOTku alankalen nangilangavE bhUmati mAnani kunjaradAsan en kali vilagavE aruL
nidhiyAm nin tudi Ayiram krti nAn tandu viLangavE aruL
